com.opentok
Interface Session.Listener

Enclosing class:
Session
public static interface Session.Listener

Monitors state changes of a Session instance.

See Also:
Session.newInstance(Context, String, String, String, Listener)

Method Summary
 void onSessionConnected()
          Invoked after Session.connect() successfully connects the instance to an OpenTok session.
 void onSessionDidDropStream(Stream stream)
          Invoked when a publisher leaves this OpenTok session.
 void onSessionDidReceiveStream(Stream stream)
          Invoked when a publisher joins this OpenTok session.
 void onSessionDisconnected()
          Invoked when the instance is no longer connected to its OpenTok session.
 void onSessionError(Exception cause)
          Invoked when something goes wrong when connecting or connected to the session.
 

Method Detail

onSessionConnected

void onSessionConnected()
Invoked after Session.connect() successfully connects the instance to an OpenTok session.

onSessionDisconnected

void onSessionDisconnected()
Invoked when the instance is no longer connected to its OpenTok session.

onSessionDidReceiveStream

void onSessionDidReceiveStream(Stream stream)
Invoked when a publisher joins this OpenTok session.

Parameters:
stream - A descriptor of the new stream, which can be used to create a Subscriber.
See Also:
Session.createSubscriber(SurfaceView, Stream)

onSessionDidDropStream

void onSessionDidDropStream(Stream stream)
Invoked when a publisher leaves this OpenTok session.

Parameters:
stream - A descriptor of the dropped stream, which can be used to identify a Subscriber.

onSessionError

void onSessionError(Exception cause)
Invoked when something goes wrong when connecting or connected to the session. After this method is invoked, the Session should be treated as dead and unavailable. Do not attempt to reconnect or invoke further instructions on the session.

Parameters:
cause - An exception describing the cause for error.
